name: Don't Forget
description:
Don't forget was made for the Gacha 2019. The subject was "russian doll".

We had 5 contraints:

- The game need to be a serious game,

- The game need to have 1 physical game element,

- The theme have to be "russian avant garde",

- Get, at least, 1 personalisable element,

- Have an hidden room.

This 5 contraints are add to the subject "russain doll". It's "the harder game jam of your life".

"Don't Forget is a serious game who make you live the evolution of Alzheimer. "

 You are, in first person view, a person who have Alzheimer. You live his daily life through his illness. But, to help himself, he made paper notes scattered in his house. Help by this paper note, you have to find object to do your daily routine and have a normal life. 

Live the puzzle mind of a person with Alzheimer.Don't Forget is the Winner of the GAme CHAllenge 2019.
